name: PantherMedia Stock Photo
author: PantherMedia

sections.description:
Be it a blog entry or an online article – you know they are created fast and easy in WordPress. And you know a picture makes all the difference. The more the better. Our brand new PantherMedia WordPress Plugin makes dealing with images in WordPress dramatically easier. It lets you find, purchase and use images directly within WordPress without having to switch between websites. There is no need to interrupt your workflow.

For more benefits, visit our Site
sections.installation:
You need:
* WordPress Version: 4.7 or higher
* an active PantherMedia Account with Credits

How to:
* Log into WordPress
* Under Plugins search for “PantherMedia”
* Install the Plugin

ATTENTION: The Plugin requires the following PHP extensions:
* JSON

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

You need:
* WordPress Version: 4.7 or higher
* an active PantherMedia Account with Credits

How to:
* Log into WordPress
* Under Plugins search for “PantherMedia”
* Install the Plugin

ATTENTION: The Plugin requires the following PHP extensions:
* JSON

short_description: This Plugin allows you get images directly via the Plugin without having to switch to the PantherMedia website.
